channel.title: gaming on Coding with Hans
channel.description: Recent content in gaming on Coding with Hans

item.title: Blazor Game Development - part 3
item.description: During these summer days I thought it would be nice to do a bit of fun programming beside my normal programming job. When thinking about this I realized that during my study time I once developed a side scrolling platform game in C++.

item.title: Blazor Game Development - part 2
item.description: During these summer days I thought it would be nice to do a bit of fun programming beside my normal programming job. When thinking about this I realized that during my study time I once developed a side scrolling platform game in C++.
